item.title: Kennedy, other Trump officials balk at requests to testify on Capitol Hill
item.description: Democrats have suggested the lack of testimony is yet another way the administration is snubbing the legislative branch.

item.title: Zelensky says he will meet Trump soon, citing progress in peace plan
item.description: The Sunday meeting suggests that Washington and Kyiv are closing in on a joint position to end the war. Russia, however, will probably reject the plan...

item.title: Trump aides’ official religious messages for Christmas draw objections
item.description: Explicitly sectarian religious messages for Christmas on official government social media accounts drew complaints from advocates for church-state sep...

item.title: Trump suffers several defeats in effort to punish opposing lawyers
item.description: Courts have ruled against Trump’s efforts to take security clearances away from opposing lawyers. The latest loss comes in a case involving lawyer Mar...

item.title: U.S. strikes ISIS in Nigeria after Trump warnings on Christian killings
item.description: The U.S. military said it attacked Islamic State militants with the approval of Nigerian authorities. The number of casualties is unknown.
